thread.title: Rihanna Busted Out A Bedazzled Flask And Was Getting Hammered At The Grammys
thread.title_full: Rihanna Busted Out A Bedazzled Flask And Was Getting Hammered At The Grammys

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Rihanna Busted Out A Bedazzled Flask And Was Getting Hammered At The Grammys
text:
The Grammys is a bloated mess. Every year artists are forced to sit around for nearly four hours and have to endure a boring overlong production. This year, Rihanna came prepared and brought a diamond-studded flask so that she could get hammered and make the Grammys somewhat bearable. 
Rihanna drinking out of a bedazzled flask at the Grammy's is my life goals pic.twitter.com/OkAX6jOMHB 
— amanda (@harryscabello) February 13, 2017 
every thanksgiving dinner pic.twitter.com/iQysElGVU7 
— Mark (@tole_cover) February 13, 2017 


Rihanna breaking out the flask halfway through the Grammys is my 2017 aesthetic pic.twitter.com/tpXtIeXhKN 
— Cole Ledford (@ColeLedford11) February 13, 2017 
Wait, Rihanna got a diamond-studded flask? pic.twitter.com/vyEEykWxiK 
— Isaac (@WorldofIsaac) February 13, 2017
